SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PersonalGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PersonalGoal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PersonalGoal extends Object implements Serializable

This class represent the personal goal card referring to the official RuleBook .

The default number of Tile inside a personal goal pattern is 6.

The score map referred to each card have a standard configuration:

  • 1 Tile match = 1 Point
  • 2 Tiles match = 2 Points
  • 3 Tiles match = 4 Points
  • 4 Tiles match = 6 Points
  • 5 Tiles match = 9 Points
  • 6 Tiles match = 12 Points
To create a new type of score map associated with a personal goal see PersonalGoal(fileName) constructor

Since:
28/03/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonalGoal

      public PersonalGoal()
      Default constructor set the pattern of the personal goal and score map capacity to default value. Pattern created is random and the score map is set to default configuration value.
      See Also:
      • PersonalGoal

    • PersonalGoal

      public PersonalGoal(PersonalGoal that)
      Use this constructor to create a copy of the PersonalGoal passed as parameter
      Parameters:
      that - Personal goal configuration that needs to be copied in the new istance

    • PersonalGoal

      public PersonalGoal(String fileName) throws FileNotFoundException

      This constructor is used to set the pattern for the card and scoreMap to the configuration specified inside the file with name passed as parameter.

      JSON file needs to be formatted as follows: 

      {"goalPattern": [{
      "row": int value,
      "column": int value,
      "tileType": String TileTypeName},
      ...
 ],"scoreMap": {
      String tilesNumber: int value,
      ...
 }}

      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file ".json" that contains personal goal card configuration
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - in case that the configuration file name passed as parameter is not found at the right configuration path
      See Also:
      • PersonalGoal

    • setDefaultScoreMap

      private void setDefaultScoreMap()
      Set score map to the default configuration:
      • 1 Tile match = 1 Point
      • 2 Tiles match = 2 Points
      • 3 Tiles match = 4 Points
      • 4 Tiles match = 6 Points
      • 5 Tiles match = 9 Points
      • 6 Tiles match = 12 Points

    • hasSamePosition

      private boolean hasSamePosition(List<EntryPatternGoal> goalPattern, EntryPatternGoal newEntryPatternGoal)
      Give this method a list of entry that compose a pattern for a personal goal card and a single entry that you want to add at the overall list, and will be determinate if there is already an entry (that compose the pattern), with same position of the new one.
      Parameters:
      goalPattern - a list of entry that form the personal goal card.
      newEntryPatternGoal - new entry for the pattern that needs to be added to the pattern
      Returns:
      true if in the pattern there is another entry with the same position, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • PersonalGoal
